pillars.title: Operate as a calm, fast crew

micros.label: Owner + due date on every task
Close loops with a one‑line status

pillars.title: Make value compounding and cash predictable

micros.label: Pause rule for burn breach (2 weeks)
Split one critical vendor across two providers

pillars.title: Learn fast; deliver outcomes people can feel

micros.label: Offer opt‑in privacy choices for research
Put next demo on calendar; 2‑week cadence
Ask for one concrete steer at demo close
Customer Wins section in monthly update
Invite a customer story to town hall

projects.title: Operate as a calm, fast crew (TEAM)
projects.rationale: Targets TEAM aims—psych safety, role clarity, monthly coaching—aligned to the TEAM pillar.

slices.title: Enforce owner and due date on every task
dod: Tracker schema requires non-empty owner and due date on new tasks.
Backfill all open tasks to include owner and due date.
Spot-check 10 tasks: each shows both fields.
slices.notes: Implements the Role Clarity & Cadence policy.

negativeEffects.risk: Ambiguous ownership causes thrash and deadline drift

slices.title: Post Monday priorities by 10:00 with owner and due date
dod: Template created for Monday priorities post.
Next Monday publish by 10:00 listing top 3 priorities per owner.
slices.notes: Weekly priorities reinforce clarity and predictable pace.

negativeEffects.risk: Unclear weekly focus increases context switching

slices.title: Add 5-minute check-in rounds to two recurring meetings
dod: Two recurring meetings updated with 5-minute check-in agenda line.
First week: both meetings open with the check-in round.
slices.notes: Small ritual normalizes voice and surfaces risks.

slices.title: Publish a three-month red-team rotation
dod: Red-team rota lists monthly reviewers for next 3 months.
One upcoming decision tagged for a red-team stress test.
slices.notes: Formalizes dissent as expected and safe.

slices.title: Create 1:1 template (two strengths and one experiment)
dod: Template has sections: two strengths, one experiment, notes.
Template link added to 100% of 1:1 calendar invites.
slices.notes: Captures strengths/experiments so growth compounds.

negativeEffects.risk: Coaching stays ad hoc and progress stalls

slices.title: Schedule 45-minute monthly 1:1s for all teammates
dod: Recurring 1:1 invite sent to every teammate.
Next month’s sessions visible on calendars.
slices.notes: Predictable cadence makes coaching fair and effective.

projects.title: Make value compounding and cash predictable (REVENUE)
projects.rationale: Advances fair rewards, healthy unit economics, and diversification.

slices.title: Create unit economics dashboard skeleton (CAC, LTV, margin, burn)
dod: Single dashboard file with sections for CAC, LTV, margin, burn.
Owner named for each metric section.
slices.notes: Centralizing core unit metrics stabilizes growth decisions.

negativeEffects.risk: Missing metrics allow spend to outpace value

slices.title: Add first-weekday 30-minute monthly finance review
dod: Recurring calendar event created for the first weekday each month.
Agenda includes CAC, LTV, margin, and burn with next actions.
slices.notes: A fixed ritual improves decision speed and quality.

slices.title: Publish pay bands and levels doc
dod: Accessible document with bands and levels published.
Link shared in a company-wide channel; view access confirmed.
slices.notes: Transparency reduces negotiation stress and perceived inequity.

slices.title: Draft and publish promotion criteria
dod: Promotion criteria drafted and peer-reviewed.
Criteria published or scheduled for publication with owners.
slices.notes: Clear criteria align raises with impact and reduce ambiguity.

slices.title: Verify at least 6 months runway in reserve accounts
dod: Evidence captured showing ≥6 months cash.
Owner named for monthly verification.
slices.notes: Liquidity buffer reduces shock impact and delivery interruptions.

negativeEffects.risk: Cash shortfalls stall operations and raise costs

slices.title: Split one critical vendor across two providers
dod: Vendor diversification checklist completed.
One critical service running with two providers.
slices.notes: Diversification lowers risk concentration and downtime costs.

projects.title: Learn fast and deliver outcomes people can feel (CUSTOMER)
projects.rationale: Supports expectations co-creation, early proof, and celebrating wins.

slices.title: Add success-criteria section to the project brief template
dod: Template updated with an Agreed Success Criteria field.
One upcoming brief completed using the new section before kickoff.
slices.notes: Co-drafting expectations reduces early misalignment.

slices.title: Put next demo on calendar and set a two-week demo cadence
dod: Next demo within two weeks on calendar.
Backlog identifies a working slice with acceptance notes.
slices.notes: Frequent demos let customers feel progress and steer early.

slices.title: Create 48-hour customer thank-you template
dod: Template drafted and stored where the team can access it.
Two recent milestones have drafts prepared within 48 hours.
slices.notes: Quick gratitude sustains momentum and deepen relationships.
